biocontainers.name: secapr
biocontainers.summary: Process sequence-capture fastq files into alignments for phylogenetic analyses. integrates allele phasing, producing haplotype alignments.

biotools.summary:
A bioinformatics pipeline for the rapid and user-friendly processing of Illumina sequences, from raw reads to alignments.

A bioinformatics pipeline for the rapid and user-friendly alignment of hybrid enrichment sequences, from raw reads to alignments.

Bioinformatic pipeline for processing Sequence Capture data for Phylogenetics.

SEquence CApture PRocessor (SECAPR).

We are now teaching a free 1-week intensive course on target enrichment data, including practical exercises for all functionalities of the SECAPR pipeline. See course overview from last year and contact tobias.andermann@bioenv.gu.se in case you are interested.
